Question.Subject: what does this error mean?
Question.Content:
Coppermine critical error: Unable to connect to database !
MySQL said: Access denied for user 'lolisam'@'localhost'
i got it when i tried going to a site that was saved under my favorites. any help is greatly appreciated :)
Question.ChosenAnswer: The website owner needs to update their code or database settings because the username - password that they use to "login" to their database is incorrect. Nothing you can do other than contacting the website's owner or tech person to fix it.

Answer.Content: The website owner needs to update their code or database settings because the username - password that they use to "login" to their database is incorrect. Nothing you can do other than contacting the website's owner or tech person to fix it.
